name: The Cave of Magic: The Troll and the Teddy
name_original: The Cave of Magic: The Troll and the Teddy
description:
My entry for the #adventuroncavejam! https://itch.io/jam/cavejam

A dangerous scary Troll guards the entrance to the cave, can you find the treasure in the cave and escape with your life? 

If you get stuck leave a comment below and I'll give you a hint.
